channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Varda says it has proven space manufacturing works — now it wants to make it boring
item.description: CEO Will Bruey says people often get Varda wrong. The company isn't "in the space industry; we're in-space industry," he said. Space is "just another ...

item.title: The Rocco Fridge Isn't So Smart, But It Sure Is Pretty
item.description: What the Rocco fridge lacks in smarts, it makes up for in looks. You have a few hours left to save on the brand's Black Friday sale.

item.title: Stock Up On Lifestraw Personal Water Filters During This Sale
item.description: WIRED readers are weirdly obsessed with this backpacking water filter. It's cheap, and it's yours.

item.title: New report examines how David Sacks might profit from Trump administration role
item.description: David Sacks’ role as President Donald Trump’s artificial intelligence and crypto czar could work out very well for his investments, according to a new...

item.title: This Alienware Laptop Is the Best Gaming Laptop Deal Going Right Now
item.description: Finding a cheap gaming laptop that doesn't suck ain't easy. But I found it.

item.title: ‘Avatar’ director James Cameron says generative AI is ‘horrifying’
item.description: James Cameron’s movies are often at the cutting edge of visual effects technology, but that doesn't make him a fan of generative AI.

item.title: Behind the scenes of drone food delivery in Finland
item.description: TechCrunch went behind the scenes of a three-party partnership between Irish drone delivery company Manna, Doordash-owned food delivery platform Wolt,...

item.title: ChatGPT launched three years ago today
item.description: It’s no hyperbole to suggest that ChatGPT subsequently transformed the worlds of business and tech.

item.title: The Best Walking Pad is 30% Off With This Cyber Week Sale
item.description: The Urevo CyberPad for Home is an extremely capable walking pad with a 14 percent incline. It's now well under $500.

item.title: 20 Best Black Friday TV Deals (2025)
item.description: Here are the best deals on screens from Hisense, TCL, Samsung, Sony, and more this shopping holiday.
